attributes.action: Vaccinate people 24 x 7 so that everyone is vaccinated by the end of March 2021
attributes.additional_details:
Government is claiming there is no clamour from people to vaccinated faster.

We want Government to know we want to be vaccinated as quickly as possible and we will be available to be called for vaccination 24 x 7.
attributes.background:
To vaccinate as many people as possible in the shortest time possible:
- make facilities and staff available to vaccinate people 24 hours a day. 
- invite people for vaccination 24 hours a day 7 days a week
- ensure supplies of vaccine is available to meet the increased demand.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
